description: CONSTRUCTION MANAGEMENT SERVICES - Trent-Severn Waterway - Northern Area Dams 2022
full_summary:
================

### Construction Management Services for Northern Area Dams on the Trent-Severn Waterway

#### Attention: Tender Announcement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for Construction Management Services to oversee the construction of dams in the Northern Area of the Trent-Severn Waterway. The project is expected to commence on an unspecified date and conclude by March 31, 2026.

#### Amendment Notice

Please note that there has been an amendment to the original tender notice. The deadline for bid submission has been revised to 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT) on October 20, 2022. All bids must be submitted prior to this deadline to be considered responsive.

#### Tender Details

* Tender Reference Number: WS3649343720
* Tender Solicitation Number: WS3649343720
* Amendment Number: 9
* Publication Date: September 3, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 20, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: None (project commencement date to be determined)
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2026
* Tender Status: Expired (for informational purposes only, as this is an amendment notice)

#### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Building Construction Management (CNST)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Bidding (Open Invitation to Submit Bids)
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements: Various free trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), are applicable to this tender.

#### Contract Details

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information: Zobia Essa (TPSGC/PSPC), zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Access to Tender Documents

The tender notice and related documents are available for download at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13992693?extsite=MTM5OTI2OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13992693?extsite=MTM5OTI2OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Prospective bidders
